messages.content: On May 7 I am standing to become Carshalton & Wallington’s next MP.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Supporting the economic recovery and bringing jobs to our area
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Continuing the economic recovery; helping create more new jobs and ensuring workers pay through further welfare reforms.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Campaigning for lower, fairer taxes that make work pay
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supporting legislation and policies that lead to lower and fairer taxes, making work more rewarding.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Tackling immigration and delivering an EU referendum
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Addressing immigration issues and committing to deliver an EU referendum to give the public a say in the matter.

issues.brexitEurope: Tackling immigration and delivering an EU referendum.
issues.economy: Supporting the economic recovery and bringing jobs to our area; campaigning for lower, fairer taxes that make work pay; continuing the economic recovery; helping create more new jobs and ensuring workers pay through further welfare reforms.
issues.socialWelfare: Ensuring workers pay through further welfare reforms.

leaflet.personalStatement: On May 7 I am standing to become Carshalton & Wallington’s next MP. I want to see us tackle the issue of immigration, improve education, deliver better transport infrastructure and bring development into our area.

politicalExperience.role: Governor of Stanley Park High School
politicalExperience.achievements: Involved in community work through his role.

images.caption: Matthew Maxwell Scott with various groups and individuals, engaging in the community.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Raised in South West London; 15 years’ experience in the private sector.
